languages.text: {n}Проктор не сводит остекленевшего взгляда с чудовищной фигуры.{/n} "Я думал, что знаю все о нарушениях Лекс Империалис, но это одним своим существованием попирает закон Его..."
{n}Solomorne stares at the monstrous figure with glassy eyes.{/n} "I thought I knew everything about Lex Imperialis violations, but that thing offends His Law by its very existence..."
languages.original_text: {n}Проктор не сводит остекленевшего взгляда с чудовищной фигуры.{/n} "Я думал, что знаю все о нарушениях Лекс Империалис, но это одним своим существованием попирает закон Его..."

{n}Solomorne stares at the monstrous figure with glassy eyes.{/n} "I thought I knew everything about Lex Imperialis violations, but that thing offends His Law by its very existence..."

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙盯着那个可怕的身影，目光呆滞。{/n}“我还以为所有违背帝国法典的东西我都见识过了，但那个东西存在本身，就违背了祂的律法……”
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stares at the monstrous figure with glassy eyes.{/n} "I thought I knew everything about Lex Imperialis violations, but that thing offends His Law by its very existence..."

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙盯着那个可怕的身影，目光呆滞。{/n}“我还以为所有违背帝国法典的东西我都见识过了，但那个东西存在本身，就违背了祂的律法……”

languages.text: {n}Solomorne observa la figura monstruosa con ojos vidriosos.{/n} «Pensé que lo sabía todo sobre las violaciones de la Lex Imperialis, pero esa cosa insulta a Su Ley con su mera existencia...».
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stares at the monstrous figure with glassy eyes.{/n} "I thought I knew everything about Lex Imperialis violations, but that thing offends His Law by its very existence..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne observa la figura monstruosa con ojos vidriosos.{/n} «Pensé que lo sabía todo sobre las violaciones de la Lex Imperialis, pero esa cosa insulta a Su Ley con su mera existencia...».

languages.text: {n}Solomorne pose un regard vitreux sur la monstrueuse créature.{/n} « Je pensais tout savoir des infractions à la Lex Imperialis, mais la simple existence de cette chose est un véritable affront à Sa loi... »
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stares at the monstrous figure with glassy eyes.{/n} "I thought I knew everything about Lex Imperialis violations, but that thing offends His Law by its very existence..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne pose un regard vitreux sur la monstrueuse créature.{/n} « Je pensais tout savoir des infractions à la Lex Imperialis, mais la simple existence de cette chose est un véritable affront à Sa loi... »

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはその怪物じみた姿を虚ろな目で見つめた。{/n}「私はレックス・インペリアの違反についてすべて知っていると思っていましたが、あの存在自体が、皇帝陛下の法に対する冒涜です…」
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stares at the monstrous figure with glassy eyes.{/n} "I thought I knew everything about Lex Imperialis violations, but that thing offends His Law by its very existence..."

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはその怪物じみた姿を虚ろな目で見つめた。{/n}「私はレックス・インペリアの違反についてすべて知っていると思っていましたが、あの存在自体が、皇帝陛下の法に対する冒涜です…」

languages.text: {n}Solomorne, canavarımsı surete parlak gözlerle bakıyor.{/n} "Lex İmperialis ihlalleri hakkında her şeyi bildiğimi sanardım ama o şey, varlığıyla bile O'nun Kanunu'na leke sürüyor..."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stares at the monstrous figure with glassy eyes.{/n} "I thought I knew everything about Lex Imperialis violations, but that thing offends His Law by its very existence..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne, parlak gözlerle canavarımsı surete bakıyor.{/n} "Lex Imperialis ihlalleri hakkında her şeyi bildiğimi sanardım ama o şey, varlığıyla bile O'nun Kanunlarına leke sürüyor..."

languages.text: {n}Solomorne starrt die monströse Gestalt mit trübem Blick an.{/n} "Ich dachte, ich wüsste alles über Verstöße gegen das Lex Imperia, aber dieses Ding beleidigt Sein Gesetz durch seine bloße Existenz ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne stares at the monstrous figure with glassy eyes.{/n} "I thought I knew everything about Lex Imperialis violations, but that thing offends His Law by its very existence..."
